# scaleway_instance_create_snapshot (Action)

This action is helpful to create a snapshot of an instance



<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `volume_id` (String) ID of the volume to snapshot

### Optional

- `name` (String) Name of the snapshot
- `tags` (List of String) List of tags associated with the snapshot
- `wait` (Boolean) Wait for snapshotting operation to be completed
- `zone` (String) Zone of the volume to snapshot
